---
title: "List of all references"
author: "Xiangjie Xue"
date: "`r format(Sys.time(), '%d %B, %Y')`"
output: html_document
bibliography: Refs.bib
---

`r {singleString <- paste(readLines("Refs.bib"), collapse=" "); str = character(0); for (i in 1:1000) {if(length(grep(paste0('RN', i, ','), singleString)) > 0){str[length(str) + 1] = paste0("@RN", i)}}}; str`
